Dallas Morning News: Attempts to rein in homeowners associations have failed in the state Legislature for more than a decade, but a rise in HOA foreclosures and a spate of public lawsuits have invigorated supporters, who see this session as their chance for reform. Legislators have filed a handful of bills that curtail HOA powers, including limiting their ability to foreclose on property and ending bans on solar panels. HOA proponents agree that the system needs review, but promise to push back at changes that threaten associations' authority. ." In a short piece for Harvard Business Review, Eric Schmidt said Google's strategic initiatives are "all about mobile." He said the company must focus on developing high-speed mobile networks that will usher in new and creative applications, mostly entertainment and social, for these phone platforms.
